title: Investigating Three Indie Superstars Accused of Emotional Abuse

media:group.media:title: Investigating Three Indie Superstars Accused of Emotional Abuse
media:group.media:description:
What began as an investigation into the collapse of a single indie studio became something much bigger, as more and more developers came forwards to share their stories.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames

Written and presented by Chris Bratt:
https://twitter.com/chrisbratt

Design and art direction by Anni Sayers:
https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

00:00 - Indie games have a founder problem
04:15 - Ken Wong & Mountains
16:55 - Steve Gaynor & Fullbright
22:52 - Robin Hunicke & Funomena
34:42 - What can we learn from all of this?
